aliases: Three-in-One, Five-in-One, Thousand-in-One, Weapon XIV (Units 1 to 5)

marvel.description: The Stepford Cuckoos were five identical mutant sisters who enrolled at the Xavier Institute and soon proved to be the crème de la crème of Emma Frost's telepathy class.

name: The Three-in-One
powersText: flawless diamond form impervious to destruction or emotion.
realName:
Celeste Cuckoo
Esme Cuckoo (deceased)
Irma "Mindee" Cuckoo
Phoebe Cuckoo
Sophie Cuckoo (deceased)
